1: -module(pixelwar_ws_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -compile(export_all).
    5: 
    6: all() ->
    7:     [receive_state_test_case, send_pixel_test_case, send_pixel_get_state_test_case].
    8: 
    9: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   10:     application:load(pixelwar),
   11: 
   12:     application:load(gun),
   13:     {ok, Apps} = application:ensure_all_started([pixelwar, gun]),
   14:     
   15:     pixelwar_sup:add_matrix("matrix"),
   16:     
   17:     [{apps, Apps} | Config].
   18: 
   19: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   20:     [application:stop(App) || App <- lists:reverse(?config(apps, Config))],
   21:     Config.
   22: 
   23: wsConnect() ->
   24:     {ok, Pid} = gun:open("localhost", 8080),
   25:     {ok, http} = gun:await_up(Pid),
   26:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
   27:     gun:ws_upgrade(Pid, "/pixel", [], #{compress => true}),
   28:     receive
   29:         {gun_upgrade, Pid, StreamRef, _, _} ->
   30:             {Pid, Ref, StreamRef};
   31:         Msg ->
   32:             ct:print("Unexpected message ~p", [Msg]),
   33:             error(failed)
   34:     end.
   35: 
   36: wsClose(Pid, Ref) ->
   37:     demonitor(Ref),
   38:     gun:close(Pid),
   39:     gun:flush(Pid).
   40: 
   41: listener(Pid, ExpectedFrame) ->
   42:     receive
   43:         {gun_ws, Pid, _Ref, ReceivedFrame} ->
   44:             ct:print("Received ~p", [ReceivedFrame]),
   45:             ?assertEqual(ExpectedFrame, ReceivedFrame);
   46:         Msg ->
   47:             ct:print("Unexpected message ~p", [Msg])
   48:     after 200 -> ?assertEqual(timeout, ExpectedFrame)
   49:     end.
   50: 
   51: receive_state_test_case() ->
   52:     [
   53:         {doc, "Tries to receive the current state of the matrix"},
   54:         {timetrap, timer:seconds(5)}
   55:     ].
   56: receive_state_test_case(_Config) ->
   57:     {Pid, Ref, StreamRef} = wsConnect(),
   58:     gun:ws_send(Pid, StreamRef, {binary, <<1:8>>}),
   59:     listener(Pid, {binary, <<>>}),
   60:     wsClose(Pid, Ref),
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: send_pixel_test_case() ->
   64:     [
   65:         {doc, "Tries to send a pixel and then verifies that we receive nothing"},
   66:         {timetrap, timer:seconds(5)}
   67:     ].
   68: 
   69: send_pixel_test_case(_Config) ->
   70:     {Pid, Ref, StreamRef} = wsConnect(),
   71:     gun:ws_send(Pid, StreamRef, {binary, <<42:16, 24:16, 1024:16>>}),
   72:     listener(Pid, timeout),
   73:     wsClose(Pid, Ref),
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: send_pixel_get_state_test_case() ->
   77:     [
   78:         {doc, "Tries to send a pixel and then verifies the current state"},
   79:         {timetrap, timer:seconds(5)}
   80:     ].
   81: 
   82: send_pixel_get_state_test_case(_Config) ->
   83:     {Pid, Ref, StreamRef} = wsConnect(),
   84:     gun:ws_send(Pid, StreamRef, {binary, <<42:16/little, 24:16/little, 1024:16/little>>}),
   85:     gun:ws_send(Pid, StreamRef, {binary, <<1:8>>}),
   86:     listener(Pid, {binary, <<42:16/little, 24:16/little, 1024:16/little>>}),
   87:     wsClose(Pid, Ref),
   88:     ok.
